reviewText:
The Worship Expression and the Solo Dancer DVD is a very helpful tool for those who may not have experience in choreographing solo dances or for those who would like to enhance their solo dances.
Pastor Lynn teaches a Contemporary Solo dance, My hope, which is very beautiful, graceful and a piece that is full of life.
This dvd is a great dvd to learn phrase and movement to help out the solo dancer....excellent resource . a must have

Pastor Lynns Solo Dancer DVD is invaluable for worship dancers wanting to take their solo dances to the next level of excellence. She teaches an entire dance step by step, which gave me ideas and helped me in choreographing my own solos dance. She also provides practical dos and donts that every dancer should know about. I know that by taking her suggestions, I will save myself some grief in my learning process of dancing for the Lord. There are tons of great worship expressions in this DVD too, which makes it a must for any worship dancer!
This DVD will inspire you to gain new movement ideas and fresh revelation and interpretation for commonly used phrases. Get ready to choreograph dynamic solo dances that are pleasing to the Father.
Powerful learning tool for any dancer. Wonderful instructions, and beautiful Choreography.
Powerful learning tool for any dancer. Wonderful instructions, and beautiful Choreography.

In addition to learning a beautiful and anointed dance to the song My Hope, I also learned helpful demonstrations of Do`s and Don`ts and great ideas to incorporate in worship dances.  I loved the  part about expressive word phrases that praise the Lord with movement expressions.  Bravo to the Solo dancer, and may the Holy Spirit pour down upon and grace the movements of all who watch and practice this DVD!

In addition to learning a beautiful and anointed dance to the song My Hope, I also learned helpful demonstrations of Do`s and Don`ts and great ideas to incorporate in worship dances.  I loved the  part about expressive word phrases that praise the Lord with movement expressions.  Bravo to the Solo dancer, and may the Holy Spirit pour down upon and grace the movements of all who watch and practice this DVD!
This DVD is very powerful - learning the dance about Hope and learning Do's and Don'ts in a solo dance.  She teaches you all the steps to the dance and walks you through very simplistically.
This DVD is very powerful - learning the dance about Hope and learning Do's and Don'ts in a solo dance.  She teaches you all the steps to the dance and walks you through very simplistically.
The dance in which Pastor Lynn demonstrated as well as taught, is beautiful yet powerful though movement.
hjgj
This DVD ministered hope into my very deepest discouraged mind, soul, and heart. I hope it does the same for you. God is the great healer!

The choreography instruction for the song in this DVD is a great resource to learn the whole thing and do it as a presentation at some point.  Although, working through it is also just good practice in learning to execute moves that I haven't done before.

This DVD is a must have for learning new and creative ideas for your dances.  I love taking a word or phrase from songs we know and adding expressive movements to it.  Whether you are a seasoned dancer or a beginner you will gain unique ideas to enhance  your choreography.

This DVD is a must have for learning new and creative ideas for your dances.  I love taking a word or phrase from songs we know and adding expressive movements to it.  Weather you are a seasoned dancer or a beginner you will gain unique ideas to enhance your choreography.

Don't let the title fool you! This is not only a valuable tool for the Solo Dance. But a great tool for teams as well. This DVD is loaded with lot's of great Do's and don'ts tips, a fully choreographed dance and movement ideas!
This DVD ministered hope into my very deepest discouraged mind, soul, and heart. I hope it does the same for you. God is the great healer!
I loved how this video showed you how to increase a dancers choreographic skills by simply taking Godly phrases and allowing the Holy Spirit to guide them in creating the movement.

All the years of taking dance classes I was never taught the techniques that were taught in this video. After watching the video I found myself trying the techniques and using the Godly phrases concepts.  I was so surprise what I was able to choreograph.  This is great video to have.  It will help a person increase their choreographic skills.

The dances and the tips that Pastor Lynn shared was so powerful.  Even though it is titled for a solo dance, the steps taught can be easily used for a group.  I really love the additional bonuses and tips at the end.

This is such a meaty resource.  I am excited about all the creative ideas!  You can use these to keep your solo choreography interesting and engaging, whether for a solo dance or for solo parts in a group ministry piece.
This ressource is so GREAT and so complementary to the Divine Choreography book. You must have it.

This is a video that both beginners and experienced dancers will enjoy. Worship expression phrases are used to build your dance vocabulary. Learn as Lynn Hayden demonstrates and teaches with step=by-step instructions.  Need new ideas?  Where does a solo dancer go?  Right here because you'll be encouraged and receive fresh steps as a solo dancer.

What an amazing DVD!  As always, Pastor Lynn was very generous in teaching a solo dance, and numerous movement ideas to assist in creating choreography such as common word phrases used in songs and how to incorporate dance composition which brings it all together. The Dos and Donts while doing a solo or even a group dance are additional gems within this treasure.

All you need to know about performng a solo dance.
This DVD is the perfect study tool for anyone who has the desire to minister as a soloist.  The ideas and concepts demonstrated are excellent.
Excellent DVD for your  library step-by-step instructions
Excellent DVD for your  library step-by-step instructions
This video will show you how to take your solo dances to the next level whether it is for a solo dance or if a dance presentation has a solo dance part.
